entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a student who is caught by Professor McGonagall for being out of bed at night. He tries to tell Neville that the story about him getting into trouble is not true.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is mentioned as a student who heard the story and believed it. Harry tries to reassure him without words.

entities.name: gryffindor
